text: This is a list of rivers in Kuwait. Kuwait does not have any permanent rivers, but does have a few wadis. Also listed are the river-like marine channels around Bubiyan Island. ==Wadis== *Bahrat al Abraq *Shaib Rujm al Jahtan *Wadi al Batin (Kuwait River) ==Marine Channels== *Khawr abd Allah **Khawr Bubiyan **Khawr az Zubayr *Khawr as Subiyah **Khawr al Tha'aleb Kuwait Kuwait Category:Geography of Kuwait
title: List of rivers of Kuwait
